articles.author: Oliver Moody, Berlin | Isambard Wilkinson, Madrid | Adam Sage, Paris | Tom Kington, Rome
articles.title: Europe steps up vaccine as Delta variant takes hold - The Times
articles.description: The Delta variant is about to become dominant across much of mainland Europe, prompting Portugal to reimpose curfews on Lisbon and more than 40 other districts.European states have been warned that
articles.content:
The Delta variant is about to become dominant across much of mainland Europe, prompting Portugal to reimpose curfews on Lisbon and more than 40 other districts.
